text: All Is Lost is a 2013 American survival-adventure movie directed by J. C. Chandor. It only stars Robert Redford as a lost man at sea. The movie has almost no dialogue. It was released to positive reviews on October 18, 2013. Category:2013 adventure movies Category:2010s American adventure movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Survival movies Category:Lionsgate movies
title: All Is Lost
